topic.title: Updating a favorite and a tab
topic.hint: If you want to edit a My favorite you can follow the same steps below.

section.title: How to rename favorites
section.p: Hover over a favorite and click on the pencil icon. Enter the new name and hit Save.

section.title: How to update a team favorite card view

item.p: Sign in to Mingle and open the project (if you're not currently working in the project).
Open the favorite that you want to update, by clicking on the named link in the list.

screenshot.alttext: Favorites sidebar control - select favorite link

bullets.title: Update the view
bullets.item: Change the view style, e.g. from list to grid.
Change the sort order, coloration, or aggregation if you're using a grid view.

item.p: Once you're happy with the updated view, open the Favorites sidebar control.
Click the 'update' icon which is provided next to the favorite name. This will override the previous definition of the favorite with the new one.
You can manage this tab via Project admin tab Favorites & tabs link.

section.title: How to update a team favorite wiki page
section.p: To update a team favorite wiki page, you can just open the page in edit mode, make your changes and save them. The wiki page will be updated and the favorite will display the new page contents.

item.p: Change the view, e.g. view style, filter conditions, add/remove columns, grid view settings
Once you're happy with the changes you made, click the Save button.
